pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br)Health: 100

Has a 10% chance to spawn from a $(l:gotchard/mobs/golem)Golem$(/l)$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#metal_machwheel_ride_chemy_card)Metal Machwheel$(/l) and $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#metal_daiohni_ride_chemy_card)Metal Daiohni$(/l) Ride Chemy Card (if you have a $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#machwheel_ride_chemy_card)Machwheel$(/l) and $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#daiohni_ride_chemy_card)Daiohni$(/l) Ride Chemy Card in your inventory)
